body:
> What determines the content of the Metadata column? I don't see input controls.
> 
> Will it always be empty when action is console-log, and contain Survey ID: when action is show-heartbeat?

Yep. It's dependent on the recipe type.

In the future when we have many different types of recipes, I suspect we'll have multiple listings, and a survey-specific one would have a survey ID column as opposed to the metadata column.

body_html:
What determines the content of the Metadata column? I don't see input controls.

Will it always be empty when action is console-log, and contain Survey ID: when action is show-heartbeat?

Yep. It's dependent on the recipe type.

In the future when we have many different types of recipes, I suspect we'll have multiple listings, and a survey-specific one would have a survey ID column as opposed to the metadata column.
